metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0561 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In append_to_verify_fifo_interleaved_ of stream_encoder.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11Android ID: A-174302683

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-0561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flac - 1.3.2-1ubuntu0.1
libflac++6v5 - 1.3.2-1ubuntu0.1
libflac8 - 1.3.2-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: flac package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-1ubuntu0.1').
